overview: In Co-production with Hora Mágica. At the opening ceremony of the 2014 World Cup, a young man broke protocol and opened a banner in the center of the lawn asking for the demarcation of indigenous lands. Werá or MC Kunumi, son of the Guarani ethnic group, is a teenager, writer, composer and rap singer from the Krukutu village, in São Paulo.
title: Kunumi, The Native Thunder
